name: Drunk Simon
description:
It's like Simon, except Simon is drunk. Things might not be as easy as you're used to them being.

Simon will play a pattern, and then you have to repeat it. The keys on the wedges are the keys to press to activate them. A wedge with "?" on it means that you need to remember what that key was!

Music Sampled from the Dubliners - Weile Weile Waila
